page.title: 20Acknowledgements Bromp on Sw
page.content: Mrs Jackson and Class 3 wish to thank the following for their generous help and transport:Mrs Reed and Class 2, Capt. Johnstone, Mrs Radford, Mrs Short, Mrs Shaw, Mrs Beaumont, Mrs Smith, Mrs Sayer, Mrs Fenton & Mr Jackson. For helping our interviewees, many thanks to: Giles Farm, Farmer Simpson, Farmer Ramsey, Home Farm, Marley Extrusions, Bradstone Factory, ARC Pipeline, Tilcon Quarries, Yuill Homes,Bridge House Hotel, Vicar of St.Annes and Colburn County Library. Class 3:J.Hewitt,M.Shaw,S.Hogg,M.Long D.Short,J,Carey,L.Johnson,K.Bland, J.Smith,S.Nicklasson,H.White,D.Bramley S.Poffley,S.Adamson,S.Glasspole, A.Hindmarsh,L.Green,K.Thompson,C.Reid M.Hornby,A.Jones,M.Fieldhouse,K.Bond V.Stevenson,R.Bridges,R.Lowery,S.Frith R.Wilkin,K.Simpson,K.Christie,L.Harris
